mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM RN, NUM, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME,PHONE, ADDRESS, PROFILE_FILE_NAME, PROFILE_FILE_PATH,POINT, REGIST_DATE FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(TBL_USER SYS_C007234) */ ROWNUM RN, NUM, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME,PHONE, ADDRESS, PROFILE_FILE_NAME, PROFILE_FILE_PATH,POINT, REGIST_DATE FROM TBL_USER WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (SEQ_USER.NEXTVAL, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER) VALUES(#{boardBno}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_BNO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_REGISTER_DATE, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BOARD_BNO = #{boardBno}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, BOARD_WRITER = #{boardWriter}, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_BNO = #{boardBno}
